open-1.title: TRUTH – Opening the Call
open-1.purpose: Establish connection, confirm identity, and set a professional tone.
open-1.why: Prospects decide in seconds if you feel like a pro or a random salesperson.
technique: Smile before you speak so your tone is warm and confident.
Say their name clearly and slowly.
Pause after you ask how they’re doing.
open-1.redFlag: Don’t rush this line or sound like a robot. This is where the relationship starts.
